title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using code assist in the software, it dirties the file even though no changes were made.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not dirty the file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the software and navigate to a file. 
2. Trigger the code assist feature. 
3. Confirm that the file is dirtied even if no changes were made.
